HNSCC.notes: limited access. Ignore. An xls file, an xlsx file and a csv file. The xls file has one sheet and has clinical data. They have similar (but not identical) data for different (but overlapping) sets of patients. xlsx data has one sheet with a data dictionary for the xls file. The csv file was not downloaded automatically as the link leads to a preview. The csv is downloaded manually. Limited access - now removed
